contents.imgAlt: Welcome collage background image. It includes photos of a bus, a guitar, a city view and a mountain top
contents.text: This tutorial will show you how to:

contents.imgAlt: Netacad courses image with Launch Course highlighted
contents.text: From the course Home page, click ‘Launch Course’.

contents.imgAlt: Course launch page with one of the images highlighted.
contents.text: Click any image to begin the course.

contents.imgAlt: Course chapter list
contents.text: From the course dashboard, you can navigate the chapters, sections, topics and pages of the course by using the course map.

contents.imgAlt: Course chapter list with Chapter 1 highlighted
contents.text: Double-click a chapter to open the first page of that chapter. Or, single click a chapter to expand the sections contained within the chapter.

contents.imgAlt: Chapter 1 sections
contents.text: Double-click a section to open the first page of that section. Or, single-click a section to expand the topics contained within the section.

contents.imgAlt: Section 1.1 and topics in that section
contents.text: Double-click a topic to open the first page of that topic. Or, single-click a topic to expand the pages contained within the section.

contents.imgAlt: Topic 1.3 and pages in that topic
contents.text: Click the page you would like to open.

contents.imgAlt: Page 1.1.3.1 content with bookmark button highlighted
contents.text: Click the ‘Bookmark’ button to bookmark the page for future reference.

contents.imgAlt: Page 1.1.3.1 content with close button highlighted
contents.text: Click the ‘Close’ button to close the page.

contents.imgAlt: Chapter, section, topic, page view with Recent Pages button highlighted
contents.text: Click the 'Recent Pages' button to view pages you have recently seen.

contents.imgAlt: Chapter, section, topic, page view with Bookmarks button highlighted
contents.text: Click the 'Bookmarks' button to view pages you have bookmarked.

contents.imgAlt: Chapter, section, topic, page view with Course Index button highlighted
contents.text: Click the 'Course Index' button to view the course outline.

contents.imgAlt: Course index
contents.text: The course index provides access to individual pages via links.

contents.imgAlt: Packet tracer index
contents.text: The Packet Tracer index provides access to Packet Tracer activity pages via links.

contents.imgAlt: Lab index
contents.text: The lab index provides access to lab activity pages via links.

contents.imgAlt: Video index
contents.text: The video index provides access to video pages via links.

contents.imgAlt: Chapter, section, topic, page view with Search icon highlighted
contents.text: Click the 'Search' button to perform a keyword search.

contents.imgAlt: Chapter, section, topic, page view with Languages button highlighted
contents.text: If available, click the 'Languages' button to choose your preferred language from available options.

contents.imgAlt: Chapter, section, topic, with Select Background icon highlighted
contents.text: Click the 'Select Background' button to change your background image.

contents.imgAlt: Chapter, section, topic, with Help button highlighted
contents.text: Click the 'Help' button to access additional tutorials.

contents.imgAlt: Help menu
contents.text: Click a menu item on the left, and the corresponding tutorial will load within this window.

contents.imgAlt: Chapter, section, topic, with Return to Classes button highlighted
contents.text: Click the ‘Return to Class’ button to return to the course home page.
